organization.title: Organization
organization.description: Your Tromzo organization subdomain used as part of the API URL (e.g., if your URL is https://acme.tromzo.com, enter 'acme')

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: The tools to get findings for

cutoff_days.title: Cutoff Days
cutoff_days.description: The number of days to look back for findings

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The start date to look back for findings

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: The end date to look back for findings

api_timeout.title: API Request Timeout
api_timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for each request to the Tromzo API. 0 means no timeout

api_page_size.title: API Page Size
api_page_size.description: The number of records to request from the API per call

api_max_retries.title: Max Number of Retries
api_max_retries.description: The max number of retries before giving up on retrying requests to the Tromzo API
